title: Wizard Staff (2C29)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Possession • Staff
Strength:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be a Wizard. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to make a minion strength -3.
Lore:	”'We must have power - power to order things as we will for that Good which only the Wise can see.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Version: +.
